amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, and Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.para: Any municipality, except a city that has received funding under the Convention Center Facility Financing Assistance Act or the Sports Arena Facility Financing Assistance Act, may apply for a grant of assistance from the fund. Application shall be made on forms developed by the department.

crossreference.para: Convention Center Facility Financing Assistance Act, see section 13-2601.
Sports Arena Facility Financing Assistance Act, see section 13-3101.
